#include <stdio.h>
int main() {
	long long int u,X,K,A[50]={1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,16384,32768,65536,131072,262144,524288,1048576,2097152,4194304,8388608,16777216,33554432,67108864,134217728,268435456,536870912,1073741824,2147483648,4294967296,8589934592,17179869184,34359738368,68719476736,137438953472,274877906944,549755813888,1099511627776,2199023255552,4398046511104,8796093022208,17592186044416,35184372088832,70368744177664,140737488355328,281474976710656,562949953421312};
	double p,q,ans;
	long int i,T;
	scanf("%ld",&T);
	while(T--){
		scanf("%lld %lld",&X,&K);
		for(i=0;i<50;++i)
		if(K < A[i])
		break;
		q = (long double)X/A[i];
		p=(long double)X/A[i-1];
		u=K-A[i-1];
		ans = q + u*p ;
		printf("%lf\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
